column4: so i've made progress with my dvd drive but have hit a wall that lots of other folks have also hit
trying to force a mount returns "mount: no medium found on /dev/sr0"
all the threads i can find seem to be about acer laptops, which makes me suspect some stupid firmware issue
you could look around in dmesg, around where it talks about /dev/sr0 and see if it mentions anything about firmware
